headline: Robinhood bets big on prediction market. Executive discusses.
summary: In August, Robinhood Markets (HOOD) expanded its prediction market to include event contracts on college and professional sports. Robinhood Vice President and General Manager of Futures and International JB Mackenzie discusses the investor hype around economic event contracts, which encompass the Federal Reserve's interest rate decisions, and other economic indicators. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.
